channel.title: Project Amazed "Gielinor, Gods, Glory, Rectify, Freedom ." Verision 1.1
channel.description:
[img]http://i145.photobucket.com/albums/r220/majesstik1/Threads/funny.gif[/img] _________________________________________________________
[size=24pt]Project Amazed[/size] [size=12pt]"Gielinor, Gods, Glory, Rectify, Freedom ."[/size] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/344oxhw.jpg[/img]
___________________________________________________________
[size=24pt]SERVER SIDED:[/size]
[size=16pt]What has been Added?:[/size]
[size=12pt]Report System:[/size] Cleaner, now prints out the report a player option and takes approximately 5.03 seconds to print out the report.
[size=12pt]Player Saving:[/size] I fixed it to much more suitable prospective and it is much better as you don't have to be clicking much.
[size=12pt]Player:[/size] I fixed it too, i changed the ipban to the same way in the "char" folder in the server folder.
[size=24pt]CLIENT SIDED:[/size]
[size=12pt]Cache:[/size] I completely changed the way it was. It has cachedownloader.java now, reason being is because i decided i was going to port-forward it. The customs look alright i guess. Though they look small i will fix this in the next version. Cache is much better looking, and cleaner.
[size=12pt]Downloading the Cache:[/size] Their can be problems with downloading because the dropbox has some issues downloading the small cache files i don't know why.
[size=12pt]New "Twin Set":[/size] I had the chance to just simply add the new weapons, i decided to make "Twin Whips" which require attack 75, and strength 75, but i didn't have time to add it on the Source Sided. _____________________________________________________________________ [size=24pt]et cetera:[/size]
[size=16pt]Picture Media:[/size]
New Icons, Tabarea, Chatarea [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/30wbjid.jpg[/img]
You can check out V1 for more.
[size=24pt]Download Media:[/size]
[size=12pt]Size:[/size] 72.01MB [size=12pt]Virus?:[/size] Of-course Not. I am not that kind of person who wants to crash your computer.
[size=16pt]Main Link:[/size][url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/camom0sqa9kxoqb/Project.zip]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/camom0sqa9kxoqb/Project.zip[/url] [size=16pt]Backup:[/size][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5d6gg6idx57pmf2]http://www.mediafire.com/?5d6gg6idx57pmf2[/url]
I don't trust Uppit.com since it was down. :P
[size=16pt]What to expect in V2:[/size]
1)Quests, Custom but Runescape format. 2)Better Fishing, Fire-making, its kind of bad and sad. 3)Agility, Farming, Their is none at all. 4)Better Cache, it kind of sucks the custom icons, but i well make it better.
[quote="Quote of the Thread"]Don't be afraid to try something new.[/quote]
________________________________________________________
[size=24pt]Tutorial for Downloading Cache:[/size]
The cache i gave you might or might not download right, if so, i gaved a backup in the Project folder.
[size=16pt]1):[/size] If it doesn't load and give errors, go to: c:/ProjectAmazed
Explanation: The files may have not extracted completly or dropbox didn't even download all. This happened to me.
[size=16pt]2):[/size] Open up the Project Folder and click on the: ProjectAmazed.zip file.
Explanation: This one is a backup for the cache so just simply click on it or download winrar. Go to google type: winrar and download it.
[size=16pt]3):[/size] Extract all the files to the: c:/ProjectAmazed and press [ Yes To All ]
Explanation: Click on the [ Extract to ] and extract the files [ Sprites, data, models, cache, etc. ] and it will put it the right files and where their suppose to be.
[size=16pt]4):[/size] Click on the C&R or client on the web folder. It should work now.
Explanation: C&R stands for: Compiler and Run. This is my custom made compiler you just clcik it and you need jdk1.7.0 or change it to jdk1.6.0 and it will start compiling. The client on: project/web/client. Is my download client in case you don't feel like compiling and running... You can just delete the: Web folder if you want. _______________________________________________________________________
[size=26pt]THIS ISN'T LEECHED OR HAS A ANTI-LEECH[/size]
Reason being: Why release something if you want to make people mad why they can't find errors or anything.
[size=16pt]CREDITS:[/size]
50% Sanity [ For Base to start it ] 40% Me [ I coded in most of the skills and all that. ] [ Or implemented ] 10% Everyone [ All of you inspire me. And a lot help me out. ]
[size=16pt]Rate, Poll, Comment.[/size]

item.title: Project Amazed "Gielinor, Gods, Glory, Rectify, Freedom ." Verision 1.1
item.dc:creator: @Project_Amazed_Carlo Project Amazed Carlos
item.description:
@Project_Amazed_Carlo wrote:

I knew you replied but your right, i didn’t take time doing the tabs if you know how to read the thread, which you don’t. I stated i didn’t finish and its called
Version 1.1 for a reason, i don’t understand but we all agree Sanity didn’t take time to do anything and did awful, so i didn’t leech.

Just the whip models but am not done. this is 1.1 not v2

Read full topic

I wish you are here looking at me. I am sitting 4 hours a day everyday coding. Please come!

item.title: Project Amazed "Gielinor, Gods, Glory, Rectify, Freedom ." Verision 1.1
item.dc:creator: @Project_Amazed_Carlo Project Amazed Carlos
item.description:
@Project_Amazed_Carlo wrote:

[size=24pt]Project Amazed[/size]
[size=12pt]“Gielinor, Gods, Glory, Rectify, Freedom .”[/size]

[size=24pt]SERVER SIDED:[/size]

[size=16pt]What has been Added?:[/size]

[size=12pt]Report System:[/size] Cleaner, now prints out the report a player option and takes approximately 5.03 seconds to print out the report.

[size=12pt]Player Saving:[/size] I fixed it to much more suitable prospective and it is much better as you don’t have to be clicking much.

[size=12pt]Player:[/size] I fixed it too, i changed the ipban to the same way in the “char” folder in the server folder.

[size=24pt]CLIENT SIDED:[/size]

[size=12pt]Cache:[/size] I completely changed the way it was. It has cachedownloader.java now, reason being is because i decided i was going to port-forward it. The customs look alright i guess. Though they look small i will fix this in the next version. Cache is much better looking, and cleaner.

[size=12pt]Downloading the Cache:[/size] Their can be problems with downloading because the dropbox has some issues downloading the small cache files i don’t know why.

[size=12pt]New “Twin Set”:[/size] I had the chance to just simply add the new weapons, i decided to make “Twin Whips” which require attack 75, and strength 75, but i didn’t have time to add it on the Source Sided.

[size=24pt]et cetera:[/size]

[size=16pt]Picture Media:[/size]

New Icons, Tabarea, Chatarea

You can check out V1 for more.

[size=24pt]Download Media:[/size]

[size=16pt]Main Link:[/size]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/camom0sqa9kxoqb/Project.zip
[size=16pt]Backup:[/size]http://www.mediafire.com/?5d6gg6idx57pmf2

I don’t trust Uppit.com since it was down.

[size=16pt]What to expect in V2:[/size]

1)Quests, Custom but Runescape format.
2)Better Fishing, Fire-making, its kind of bad and sad.
3)Agility, Farming, Their is none at all.
4)Better Cache, it kind of sucks the custom icons, but i well make it better.

Quote of the Thread:

Don’t be afraid to try something new.

[size=24pt]Tutorial for Downloading Cache:[/size]

The cache i gave you might or might not download right, if so, i gaved a backup in the Project folder.

[size=16pt]1):[/size] If it doesn’t load and give errors, go to: c:/ProjectAmazed

Explanation: The files may have not extracted completly or dropbox didn’t even download all. This happened to me.

[size=16pt]2):[/size] Open up the Project Folder and click on the: ProjectAmazed.zip file.

Explanation: This one is a backup for the cache so just simply click on it or download winrar. Go to google type: winrar and download it.

[size=16pt]3):[/size] Extract all the files to the: c:/ProjectAmazed and press [ Yes To All ]

Explanation: Click on the [ Extract to ] and extract the files [ Sprites, data, models, cache, etc. ] and it will put it the right files and where their suppose to be.

[size=16pt]4):[/size] Click on the C&R or client on the web folder. It should work now.

Explanation: C&R stands for: Compiler and Run. This is my custom made compiler you just clcik it and you need jdk1.7.0 or change it to jdk1.6.0 and it will start compiling. The client on: project/web/client. Is my download client in case you don’t feel like compiling and running… You can just delete the: Web folder if you want.

[size=26pt]THIS ISN’T LEECHED OR HAS A ANTI-LEECH[/size]

Reason being: Why release something if you want to make people mad why they can’t find errors or anything.
